content: this bear is a mini version of the bear pattern i released in 2014 see the bear from 2014 here 1 **mini bear size** 4 5 inches from bum to top of ears the perfect size for little hands i do believe they are the perfect size to be made into a mobile get creative and have fun **written pattern** get the pattern here 2 **video tutorial** there are videos that go over each section of the written part this bear view the playlist of videos here 3 **bride and groom** i have patterns to make a top hat bow tie flowers and veil the videos are on youtube the written patterns will be released asap 1 https //www amigurumitogo com/2014/11/crochet-teddy-bear-youtube-tutorial html 2 https //www amigurumitogo com/2018/05/crochet-mini-bears html 3 https //www youtube com/playlist list=plbuvhsa9qzayqjxst5il5e5ff719v5ew6
